name: Nodejs
tagline: nodejs and express framework with backbone.js
body:
### Welcome to Nodejs.
This repository is dedicated to the beginners. There are very use full tutorials every about node, but here you will see code samples. Feel free to copy paste and or push new additions. 

```
$ https://github.com/khurramijazm/nodejs.git
$ git fetch origin
```

### Backbone.js And Underscore.js
The node tutorial would be incomplete without backbone.js. Backbone has hard dependency upon underscore.js. I believe it is an Art to structure your code and Backbone is the tool. More will 
be added here soon. 


### Authors and Contributors
@khurramijazm . 

### Support or Contact
Feel free to send me an email at khurramijazm@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
